Articles.Content:
Hello There!

I have recently came across a problem the last few weeks and it is, as the title suggests, a low framerate when I am in the SPH (about 5-10 FPS). When I am in the Astronaut Complex, the VAB, the tracking station or even in space controlling a spacecraft, everything runs fine, the framerate is good. Does the problem come from the mods? I would not say I run a lot of mods (49, is that a lot?) and I do not know one that could cause this kind of problem.

My GPU driver is up to date and I run the latest version of KSP.

 

Thanks in advance for your help!
